oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Holy Sister Temple

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Small broadside advertises the services of healer and adviser Holy Sister Temple, a self-proclaimed religious holy woman who guarantees that she can heal the sick and ailing. She also lists her address.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Broadsides; Healers; Healing; Spiritual life; Spiritualism
Broadsides; Healers; Healers, Black; Healers--United States
